OrgName.entry: FIRTH PARK CENTRE FOR LIFE - VENUES FOR HIRE

Desc.entry: Community centre with rooms available for hire including a large hall and a large meeting room. Has a strict no smoking and no alcohol policy. Hosts a craft group, flower arranging group, cerebral palsy group etc. Company limited by guarantee no 4468415.

DisabledAccess.entry: Induction loop only in the worship area, wheelchair lift
